modName: Mimi Page Dovahkiin Female Victory Cry
summary: A FEMALE Dovahkiin Cry!! Voice by Mimi Page
descriptionHtml:
Mimi Page Dovahkiin Female Victory Cry Version 2.0

In response to your amazing feedback and requests I have made
Lots of changes, ridiculous hours audio editing, but hey enjoy!
First and most exciting news Mimi Page
www.mimipage.com
who did a fantastic song here;

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8tzPTT4C8i4

has very kindly provided me with just the voice tracks for drum roll please....
A FEMALE Dovahkiin Cry!!
I\' m sure that many will be familiar after having watched the Skyrim teaser trailer 100\'s of times. It\'s amazing and beautiful.
The audio quality of the music is superb.

I also whipped up a really cool Dragon Heart Beat Death, and when it\'s heart stop you absorb its soul.
Install this optionally.

The music can be included or excluded from all the versions



You tube video links;
Dovahkiin Victory Cry Female & Music
http://youtu.be/zdAqtya-yGo

Dovahkiin Victory Just Music
http://youtu.be/ZmSqkKvzEMM


NOTE*
OK for anyone that was hearing chanting with this mod installed thanks to morpheus768 and little troubleshooting i added an optional file to mute this sound, so you can hear this mod only. This will affect finding new words of power, so be warned. The only other option right now is to just turn down the music when fighting a dragon.


The original male version is located here;
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6615
author: gloomfrost
